name: Afro Samurai Dude Pixel Art Book
name_original: Afro Samurai Dude Pixel Art Book
description:
when you combine the noble image of a samurai, the size of a smurf, the danger of being eaten by demon like fungi, necromancers and skeletons, this is what you get as a concept art book for a mini game - AFRO SAMURAI DUDE

When demons eat your cat, what is there to do than let slip the dogs of upon those foolish demons.

Hope you like it please like and subscribe , and for more goodies please consider the below sites, who knows what goodies might pop up! :)

https://www.behance.net/blackducko9245

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxHkrv_zcpM-JjXQB8Yueow
